## Factominer Tea dataset

```{r cars}
library(FactoMineR)
data(tea)

library(RColorBrewer)
col <- brewer.pal(8, 'Dark2')
palette(col)

summary(tea)

keep <- c("Tea", "How", "how", "sugar", "where", "lunch")

tea <- dplyr::select(tea, dplyr::one_of(keep))
mca <- MCA(tea, graph = FALSE)
summary(mca)
plot(mca, invisible=c("ind"), cex=0.9, title="Variables in the 1st two dimensions", habillage = "quali")
mca

```
